review: Excellent product. Although there are several streaming boxes out there nowadays this is still what we considered to be the best for the money. It may have some features you will not make the most use of, such as the games, but it offers the opportunity where others do not. Full disclosure we are PRIME members so this was a key factor in OUR decision but likewise we use it for Netflix and Hulu. We recently got rid of our cable tv and simply upgraded our internet to allow for everything to be streamed. This unit is great as our living room tv is "dumb" and the samsung bluray player while wifi capable is buggy at best. This has seemlessly played our PRIME content which our little one loves and we have enjoyed the movies and tv shows with no issues. The control is great and voice search feature functions very well. The keyboard input is smooth and responsive the only better option would be to have an acutual keyboard connected to it, but in instances where there is a lot to type you can typically just use the voice search.The unit is fast and responsive, no issues to complain about at this stage. We have been very happy with our purchase!
author: Edgar

review: Purchased at half price with a sling bundle. Unit is nothing to write home about. We already had roku's in each bedroom.. used this to try out in the main room. Seemed to be the same as roku.. nothing that stood out or any 'advantages' over roku.Wouldn't buy another one in the future based off current model offerings.

review: Super easy to use and set up. Great quality, fast speed, I love love love this little box! I previously had been using a Wii to play my Netflix and Hulu with, but am so happy I found this! Plus I can listen to my music on my Prime Account, surf the internet, watch YouTube videos, play games and do all kinds of other things with my Amazon Fire Tv! You wont be disappointed!

review: Not having access to live TV or even the local cable channels is disappointing. Having TNT, A&E;, USA, & Disney re-runs from last year is not what I wanted in order to save money... Guess there isn't much competition with Comcast & Time Warner Cable...

review: All its cracked up to be. Simple install with the Sling Tv has enabled me to ditch my cable provider and no longer fight for promotional pricing from the cable company. One time investment along with an antenna and my hubby gets his NASCAR, ESPN, and local channels and we watch tv interruption free on Netflix and Hulu. LOVE IT!
author: W. Gifford

review: yes, we bought 3 more..........now have four boxes for 4 TVs...........extremely easy set up on new gear... for a change  ...........love the hugh choice of free series and movies with Prime and really like additional choices with Netflix streaming through it.............caused me to watch 30 hours of Downton Abbey over 3 days this weekend........never seen any episode before and was great to see 36 episodes back to back uninterrupted..........bad news is that I am watching more TV, but finally an easy way to see what I want to see and have movie CHOICES rather than Honey Boo Boo, Duck Dynasty as the only options.........have gotten very tired of bad and repetitive programming on Direct TV.......... only small complaint is that I wish it was a little easier to search.........could use more classification by genera, rather than having to know the title or actor name
